name: GKAccessPoint.Location
desc: Specifies the corner of the screen to display the access point.

items.name: case bottomLeading
items.desc: The lower-left corner of the screen.

items.name: case bottomTrailing
items.desc: The lower-right corner of the screen.

items.name: case topLeading
items.desc: The upper-left corner of the screen.

items.name: case topTrailing
items.desc: The upper-right corner of the screen.
